mapper.select: select * from user where `id` = (select user_id from duty2user where duty_id = #{dutyId})
mapper.insert: insert into user (name, password, phone) values ("${name}","${password}","${phone}");
mapper.update: update user set hawadee.user.`password` = #{newPassword} where hawadee.user.name = #{username}
update user set hawadee.user.`phone` = #{newPhone} where hawadee.user.name = #{username}
